name: Solar System-THE MILKY LANE
description:
This is a Solar System simulation made with Unity.

It simulates the 8 main planetary bodies' orbiting cycles around the sun. It also simulates comets and light being emitted from the sun. 

The player can select on each body to have their camera follow that individual body as it orbits around the sun. Enjoy!

Created by Paballo 'Pablo' Kekana
